:::config { "language": "html-ruby-erb" }
<%# Non-printing tag ↓ -%>
<% if @keys_enable -%>
<%# Expression-printing tag ↓ -%>
keys <%= @keys_file %>
<% unless @keys_trusted.empty? -%>
trustedkey <%= @keys_trusted.join(' ') %>
<% end -%>
<% if @keys_requestkey != '' -%>
requestkey <%= @keys_requestkey %>
<% end -%>
<% if @keys_controlkey != '' -%>
controlkey <%= @keys_controlkey %>
<% end -%>

<% end -%>
:::expectation
